price: نو په څار څار ترې ووتو، وېلې زما ربه له ظالمانو مې وژغورې!
arabic: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fakharaja min'hā khāifan yataraqqabu qāla rabbi najjinī mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
